title: 820-3332 PCI driver IOService open error
message:
Hi, 
When installing OS stop with  "check for hardware error " tried several OS version ,different install disks , and know good harddisk but same problem.
I can boot with installed OS but this time crash OS when updating or any app installing 

ASD report is;

SATA: SATA PCI Register Test (test #1) - SATA PCI Register Test

- Checks the SATA link error registers for dropped data packets using direct PCI access.

 ERROR - -12105 [PCI driver IOService open error] -- TEST FAILED




Any idea?

title: 820-3332 PCI driver IOService open error
message: Corrosion around SSD connector, knocked component, seems to be a communication error, check around U4510 also...

title: 820-3332 PCI driver IOService open error
message: Thank you [USER="36"]aprendiz[/USER] , connector looks fine already cleaned and resoldered pins. Replaced U4510 and filter capacitors but same issue :(

title: 820-3332 PCI driver IOService open error
message: You sure the SSD is good?

title: 820-3332 PCI driver IOService open error
message: Yes [USER="2"]dukefawks[/USER]  replaced 2 times known good SSD. ( Already I can install this ssd at another computer)

title: 820-3332 PCI driver IOService open error
message:
I really have no idea. What you could try is this: [url]http://www.ebay.co.uk/itm/171718087766?_trksid=p2057872.m2749.l2649&ssPageName=STRK%3AMEBIDX%3AIT[/url]
It will only use the SATA interface, so if the issue is in the PCI lines this should solve the problem.
